<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81217</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81217</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4432</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Italian Reading Comprehension (2)</string>
            <string language="es">Comprensión de lectura en italiano (2)</string>
            <string language="ga">Léamhthuiscint Iodáilise (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisches Leseerfassen (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension Italienne de Lecture (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão Italiana Da Leitura (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione Italiana Della Lettura (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλική κατανόηση ανάγνωσης (2)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Journalistic passage dealing with the issue of food safety. Students should analyse the passage for its main points, discover some vocabulary associated with food and look for grammatical details.</string>
            <string language="es">Pasaje periodístico que trata sobre la seguridad de la comida. Los estudiantes deberían analizar el pasaje buscando sus principales puntos, descubrir el vocabulario asociado con la comida y buscar detalles gramaticales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sliocht iriseoireachta a dhéileálann le ceist na sábháilteachta bia. Ba cheart do dhaltaí anailís a dhéanamh ar an sliocht chun a phríomhphointí a aimsiú, roinnt foclóra a fhoghlaim a bhaineann le bia agus sonraí gramadaí a chuardach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Italian</string>
            <string language="es">Italiano. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Iodáilis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Journalistischer Durchgang, der die Ausgabe der 
Nahrungsmittelsicherheit beschäftigt. Kursteilnehmer sollten 
den Durchgang für seine Hauptsachen analysieren, etwas Wortschatz 
entdecken, der mit Nahrung verbunden ist und nach grammatischen 
Details suchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Passage journalistique traitant la question de la
sûreté de nourriture. Les étudiants devraient analyser le 
passage pour ses points principaux, découvrir un certain vocabulaire 
lié à la nourriture et rechercher les détails grammaticaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Passagem journalistic que trata da introdução 
da segurança do alimento. Os estudantes devem analisar a 
passagem para seus pontos principais, descobrir algum vocabulário 
associado com o alimento e procurar detalhes gramaticais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Passaggio journalistic che si occupa 
dell'emissione di sicurezza dell'alimento. Gli allievi 
dovrebbero analizzare il passaggio per i relativi punti principali, 
scoprire un certo vocabolario connesso con alimento e cercare i 
particolari grammaticali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημοσιογραφική μετάβαση που εξετάζει το ζήτημα της 
ασφάλειας τροφίμων. Οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να αναλύσουν τη 
μετάβαση για τα βασικά σημεία του, να ανακαλύψουν κάποιο 
λεξιλόγιο που συνδέεται με τα τρόφιμα και να ψάξουν τις 
γραμματικές λεπτομέρειες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Italien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
